# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  README tags vpwl-word.csv vpwl_binaryfile.cir vpwl_binaryfile.cir.sh options DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpwl_binaryfile.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_671/vpwl_binaryfile.cir.sh COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} vpwl_binaryfile.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} vpwl_binaryfile.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_671/vpwl_binaryfile.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_671/vpwl_binaryfile.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpwl_binaryfile.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_671/vpwl_binaryfile.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;vpwl;pwl;errorexit")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_671/vpwl_binaryfile.cir.sh COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} vpwl_binaryfile.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} vpwl_binaryfile.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_671/vpwl_binaryfile.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_671/vpwl_binaryfile.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpwl_binaryfile.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_671/vpwl_binaryfile.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;vpwl;pwl;errorexit")
endif()
